page.title: 13Fairford Parents Typical Day
page.content: This report has been compiled by Mrs. S.A. Bowling for the 4th. July 1985. 7.25. The{alarm}went off. Rick got up. I got up and went downstairs. Rick had started{breakfast. 8.00. Cleared the table. Rick went to work.{Children went to school.}I washed and dressed and then went to {work. 9.00. Typed school reports today. 11.00. Coffee 1.10. Had my{lunch. 1.20. Worked until 3.00.. 3.15. Arrived home. Daniel arrived. 4.00. Jennie arrived home. 5.00. Prepared and had{tea. 5.50. Rick arrived home. 6.00. Daniel to Cubs.{I ran Brownies. 8.00. Collected Daniel. Went home. 9.00. Children in bed. 9.10. Watched T.V..{Bed at 11.00 !
